channel.title: Hybrid Source and Client help
channel.description:
1. How do I fix the CORP and TD glitch so players can hit them back.
2. How do I add an auto save feature
3. How do I add empty for all players

item.title: Hybrid Source and Client help
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:

  1. http://www.rune-serber.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/319328-hybrid-pvp-v3-fixing-corporeal-beast-tormented-demons-drops-pi-dspk.html

  2. What do you mean? Like saving on logout? Or a save command?

  3. Show your commands class or move it under public void playerCommands or whatever your method is.

  4. Don’t use this source lol…
